name: Samurai Runner
description:
An Honorable Samurai Family was trying to escape their homeland after it has been invaded by monsters.

**FREE TO PLAY / OFFLINE - NO INTERNET REQUIRED TO PLAY**

- Enjoy free to download, free to play game!
- Enjoy playing even if you don't have WiFi available!


**ENDLESS RUNNER / ACTION ROLE PLAYING GAME**

- Thrills of an endless runner game
- Hack and Slash monsters
- Jump and dodge obstacles
- Level up so you can unlock different Samurai Style Characters
- Collect power ups, health potions to reach high score

**CUTE LOW POLY 3D GRAPHICS**

- Adorable Samurai Characters to unlock!
